title: sonar
text:
sonar

The sonar commandlet allows to install, configure, and launch SonarQube.


Table 24. Usage of devon sonar






Argument(s)
Meaning




setup
Setup SonarQube (install and verify)


start
Start your local SonarQube server


stop
Stop your local SonarQube server


analyze
Analyze current project with SonarQube
